website_summaries.verdict: In addition to being a good value, it offers comfortable support with an easy-to-adjust closure.
pros: A popular model that stands out for its low price and highly effective design
Secures easily with Velcro closure which adjusts to prevent it from being too tight
cons: It's not very wide, and may not be practical for larger individuals
The closure is a bit bulky – possibly visible under some types of clothing

customer_reviews.title: I love the band
customer_reviews.text: I love the band. It fits comfortably and can be wore under and outside your clothes. Am 5"8 186lbs wearing size 12, my waist is 38 and I purchase a meduim band which fits perfectly. I Hope this will be helpful to someone.
customer_reviews.author: taneisha tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Thee BEST customer service
customer_reviews.text: Let's jump right in my waist is 33.5 I ordered a medium for myself and a large for my mom. I took pics in both sizes...as you can see the medium fits but the is slightly uncomfortable. The large feels much better and the company was nice enough to resend me a larger size at no cost to me. I have numerous waist trainers that I paid GOOD money for, the price for a product of this quality is absolutely crazy but WONDERFUL nonetheless....Thank you for a great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this corset! Bought it to go with 2 other items I purchased to complete my Renaissance Festival outfit. I'm 120lbs and 5'5" and the small fit perfect! Based on my measurements the size chart told me to order a medium but I didn't want it to fit too big and I knew I could adjust it. There's plenty of room to loosen in the back if need be. Definitely a great buy. Very well made. Colors are a dark brown and black stripes. I'll post more pics after I go to the festival this weekend😜.
customer_reviews.author: Heather  Von Glahn

customer_reviews.title: BAD Quality
customer_reviews.text: the bone of the shaper ripped through the stitching and i've only worn it three times .BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great back support I am 156lbs 5' 4" I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: Great back support I am 156lbs 5' 4" I wish it was a bit longer but its a waist shaper not a waist loss belt although you will sweat. It does the job thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: KLee

customer_reviews.title: That Waist Trainer Tho..
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. It contours around your waist nicely, unlike the others that are just a band. The adjustable smaller straps are money! I am a size 12 for your reference and this helps with my posture as well. I normally slump down while I run/jog due to a larger chest, but this belt encourages me to stand straight up and keep that form. The curvy feature of the Camelias Waist Trainer is wonderful. You are not spilling out of it and looking like a sausage with a rubber band tied around the middle...not a good look for anyone. Buy this. Try this. Love this. The price is so low and the product is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms CG

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for sure! Did my usual 2hr workout routin of deadlifts and lower body weight training, and definitely feel the support! Im 5'3 and 170lbs i got size Large. Very comfortable and STAYS PUT! no slipping or even rolling up. My curves today are like BAM! I will update you all within a month on how this has progressed my curves and workouts. Also it is so comfortable i wear it outside over my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Laskaa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I normally wear a XL in shirts but I ordered a 5XL because of my size G breasts and it fits perfectly! Haven’t used it for weight loss yet as I just put it on but I’m sweating just standing here. 💙
customer_reviews.author: jackalo 16

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back and stomach muscles
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a Large and it had a different logo than the medium I just recieved. The large I ordered a few years ago served it’s purposed, but I had to order a new one because the Velcro was not holding as well and I lost weight. The medium I ordered is great so far. The Velcro is very strong and it helps because I’ve had two c-sections and have muscle separation and it helps hold it together while I workout. I also slouch terribly and it helps keep my back straight so I do not injure myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying why I purchased this item: I wanted to wear this for shaping, but also posture. The product appears well made, but fits odd. I have another shaper that is one of those “celebrity sponsored” ones (which I’m not going to advertise for lol!) but the fit is night and day. This one’s fit cuts into you in weird places due to the odd fit. Even if you were doing zero activity and laying flat, it would be uncomfortable. God forbid you move in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but short...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this belt. Great quality and design, and it lays very discreetly under my workout clothes, and gives an hourglass shape. My only complaint is that it does not cover my whole midsection. I can have a mushroom top and cover my mothers-pouch. Or I can wear it under my bra line, which does nothing to help with the pouch... I ended up wearing my old waist trainer around my lower half in an effort to work on the mothers-pouch. I do think that I should have ordered a size down, because the first Velcro closure almost over laps already. But, the two side closures help to tighten it up.
customer_reviews.author: Daphinie Walton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it. I used it for my pirate costume for Halloween, because the original one that came with the costume was already broken. I will be buying a regular one soon aswell. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Smits

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer is high quality and sturdy. I'm sure it will hold up for quite a long time! For those saying it fits small: it's a waist trainer, it's supposed to. The fit is exactly what it is meant to be. For reference: I'm 5'4 and 115 pounds and the small fits snugly. I'm sure it would still fit if I were to lose or gain a few pounds as well. I would definitely recommend Camellias to others! Honestly I am just so impressed with the quality and so pleased with how reasonably priced my waist trainer was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pirate Costume!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the item for the price! Authentic looking as well! I ordered it as part of costume for Pirates Day at the Renaissance Faire and everything pulled together perfectly. I paired it with an off the shoulder gathered white blouse and a long black tiered skirt. I'm 5'8 and normally wear a size 8-10, but ordered an XL to be safe. It fit perfectly with the shoulder straps at their longest notch and with the corset ties in the back loosened a bit. It is definitely slimming and makes you look and feel like you have a tiny waist!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: UGH I don't know how anyone could wear this! It's not comfortable at all and it's always shifting when you move around. It's either slides up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not made durable enough.
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer was perfect for what I was looking for. Didn't really buy it for the pain relief but more so the support and waist shaping aspect. This one won't give you the sauna effect if that's what your looking for. ******Edit***** After a few more uses I noticed that the sewing was coming undone and boning was slipping out. This product will probably not last another couple workouts. I did only wash it once on gentle and hung dry. No reason it should be coming already.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary e.

customer_reviews.title: THE FREAKING BOMB!!
customer_reviews.text: One we write reviews but sis, this waist trainer !!!!! Let me tell you, are used to use the late text ones and they hurt after a few hours this I literally can wear all day !!! I work two jobs and I can breathe perfectly and move perfectly in this waist trainer, I wear it through my 12 hours of working each day I waited about a week to break it in so I can give an honest review. My stomach is getting trimmer and it curves my appetite a lot. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jalisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not a good belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt hurt my back it something sticking me in the back I can’t wear it and it’s to big for me so I gave it to my sister and she can fit it perfectly but it sticks her in the back and hurts and it rolls up so we had to buy another brand I wasted my money on this item
customer_reviews.author: Tashia Kyles

customer_reviews.title: not long enough that covers your torso
customer_reviews.text: So I've been looking for a sweatband/ waist trainer and was hoping this would be it. I've bought a couple. This one is terrible because the part where it closes is created like an X so the top and bottom of your torso (pooch) hangs out. So with all the compression, those 2 areas pooch out. I did buy my correct size, so it's just the model of it. It doesn't cover the top or bottom. I am short 5'2 and have a short torso, so if you have a long torso.. forget about it. you will only sweat a strip of your torso
customer_reviews.author: Aj noir

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this is 3 stars is because the XL size was too large. Once I reorder the size L I will update my review as necessary. I'm 5' 7" and 190lbs. I just had a baby (my second) and struggling to lose weight. I got this for back support and waist training while I work out. Other than the size it feels very durable and I liked how much covered my torso. I would recommend sizing down from what you normally wear for that snug waist training fit.
customer_reviews.author: Phuneeghai

customer_reviews.title: So-so..
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first ever waist trainer and I like it but there were a few problems. For starters, it’s a little short so if your looking for a longer waist trainer or if you have a long torso don’t buy this one. And this is my 5th day wearing it and I notice the material doesn’t hold up well cause it’s wrinkling and folding at the bottom when I sit so it creates this ugly fold.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better
customer_reviews.text: So amazing for the price! I got a medium and I am 5'4" 140lb and i mean I have about 4" of gap in the back when it's totally tight but I think that's how it's supposed to be. I am totally in love with this! Perfect for my pirate costume!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McInnis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!!
customer_reviews.text: This belt will certainly pull you in. I wear a size 12 and I accidentally bought a medium and it still fit. I really like the additional straps, they give a lot of support. This is the best waist belt I’ve ever purchased. I’ve only had this belt on for an hour and my abs are burning. I can’t believe how weak my core is.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Once I put it on correctly holy moly did it take a lot of pressure off my back! when I sat, I it instantly set up straight and alleviated my lower back pain. It is very adjustable I think the object is to get the small velcros overlap but that's not happening right now that's my goal!! I could wear it for about 3 hours and I had to take it off. Will slowly work up to a full 8hr work day, while I'm working from home. Keep me from eating all the snacks. Will definitely work out in it!
customer_reviews.author: A.J

customer_reviews.title: Hint of sexy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Made my costume for Halloween with a Steampunk vibe but I will wear it other times as well. Really defined my waist and made the "girls" look great.
customer_reviews.author: Usuallywear heels

customer_reviews.title: Good Waist Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It does the same this as the other more expensive brands of waist trainers. Cinches your waist however tight you want it. To be honest, I wouldn't use it as back support to lift heavy weight. I don't feel the support when I do but if you have good form during heavy lifting exercises, there is nothing to worry about. It's a waist trainer, not a corset to hide your belly under clothing or suck your belly in. Make sure you use the correct size because it might not fit appropriately. Been using it for about 1 month and I can see how my waist is slowly taking shape.
customer_reviews.author: Krizia

customer_reviews.title: but for my torso I feel like it should be a little longer in the front
customer_reviews.text: The corset arrived in a timely manner and does fit, but for my torso I feel like it should be a little longer in the front. I'm 5'8" 187lbs but I'm an athletic/curvy build and I ordered a large because I wanted a very firm fit. I wore it for the first time yesterday during my vigorous workout and for the most part everything stayed in place. I didn't have to keep adjusting the straps but I did feel like I had to pull it down periodically in the front. However, I think a x-large would've been too big for the fit I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro grip is very strong!
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer has a lot of grip to it. I didn’t realize there was a main strap and the smaller waist strap that can be adjusted. My only 2 cons are It (slightly) slides down my waist , so I’m occasionally sliding it back up. And the plastic bars that are in them can press against the hips, you can noticeably feel them.. I’m not sure how it will feel once I begin sitting with it, if I will feel it pressing into my skin. I have been able to comfortably sleep with it. Overall I’ve been using it daily for the past 2 days so far and for the price it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Great quality and very cute!
customer_reviews.text: OVERVIEW: This is a very nice quality corset. I absolutely love it! I got the brown corset, and like it for both steampunk and pirate themed costumes. My waist and hip measurements are 26” and 36, respectively. PROS: -made well, high quality -easy to put on and take off by oneself -VERY cute -shoulder straps add comfort and supportive -long torso actually almost hits the hips! CONS: -kind of large. I ordered a medium, which says it fits 24-26” waist, but fits only if I tighten the lacing completely or wear a thicker shirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Received my product in a timely manner however; Not happy at all! this is more like a support belt for heavy lifting or back support. I have a lumbar brace that is identical, only difference is the name on it, and if I send it back, I lose money because they don’t cover the UPS charge to ship their product back like some others do!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Link

customer_reviews.title: fits as exspected and does what exspected
customer_reviews.text: Although the package was left at the neighbors location out in the open. I was able to knock on my window to let the carrier driver know and he corrected it by hand delivering it directly to me the receiver/customer through my window without any hesitation. He was nice, courteous, and said hello, and thank you. Did I mention that he was also handsome. AMZL-US Tracking TBA 448599664000. Knowing were the driver is and how many stops away helps a lot and can cut down on thief and lost packages. Vanee D. Flowers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best and more comfortable waist
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with many other waist cincher, girdle, shaper to bring my waist back to shape. This was by far the winner in terms of comfort, level of support, and the squeezing you need to get your waist back in shape The product has many Velcro straps for more security. It supports your back and compresses your tummy. It also makes you sweat the abs area while training. Would definitely recomend if you do weight lifting and need to protect you back or if you do cardio and are trying to burn belly fat.
customer_reviews.author: SeleneQ.

customer_reviews.title: Great sweat!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's advertised to do, make your mid-section sweat! I love the ease of it and the velcro makes this simple to gather. it's very durable and sturdy, and the fabric makes it easy to wipe down. Unfortunately, I ordered it a bit too big, but it still does the job because you can pull it tight. I would order this again and I have suggested it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Best waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this waist trainer! I needed to size down cause I slimmed down a bit. I measured myself and ordered based on that. Fits perfect. I’m more on the petite side so some waist trainers dig into my ribs and are uncomfortable. This is perfect. Covers all the area you need from your hips up. It’s not uncomfortable as many trainers are. I wear it for working out and it does increase sweating. It’s also very comfortable to wear while working out. If you’re hesitant, just buy it cause you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The corset ran a little tight (I'm a size 0 and ordered a small) but it worked out perfectly for my pirate costume. Great quality product, especially for the price. I will definitely order another color in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleylynn

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I got this waist belt to help my rib cage back in shape post pregnancy. I also use it while I am cycling and doing Chloe Ting workout. It's only been a couple days, but so far so good! The Velcro is really strong, and there is a lot of flexibility in how tight or loose you would like to go. Cycling with the belt was great, because it helped me to keep a nice straight back. I even wear it when I am not working out, just to keep a nice posture and tighten my ribs&waist. Overall, good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jcfamily

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect and hugs wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: It shipped right away and it is gorgeous on! I usually wear a small but i followed the measurements and ordered a medium. It fits perfect and hugs wonderfully. I cant wait to wear it in September.
customer_reviews.author: Roma Tomatoes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely costume piece.
customer_reviews.text: This corset fit perfectly for my tastes. I am 5'5, 29" waist, 36" bust - I ordered an XL and it fit perfectly, I was able to put it on without untying the laces in the back. I probably could have gone to a large instead, but I don't like the look of a corset straining in the back and prefer it to be tied in a straight line without any gaps, so this was a perfect size for me. It was comfortable to wear all day long and very flattering. I would highly recommend - It was a perfect addition to my renaissance fair costume.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Tight,  good elasticity,  great and comfortable material.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I use this type of trainer. I bought it to speed up my abdomen results, and it has honestly helped me more than I thought. It has helped me with my posture in the exercises that I do everyday. It molds my waist much more. It's quite comfortable, and it's not exaggerated when you are wearing it, which is why I also liked it. Extra point because I can wear it really tight and still I can adjust it even tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: it fit great, but after an hour of use at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited, it fit great, but after an hour of use at the gym, it tore in 3 places.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Options
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t decide between the two options so I bought both. They are both comfortable, the regular one is a little wider in width and overall is the one I kept as the “back lumbar support” felt like it could cause a rash if I used it to work out in. Top in picture is the “back lumbar support” bottom is the regular one
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working out
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think this was going to be as great as I thought. I been lifting for a while and I suffered from back pain, but not anymore! The material is hard, and gives resistance, but it’s also gentle with your skin. It comes with two strips around the waist that you can adjust. I mostly use it at the gym, but I been using it after work, to get a smaller waist and I saw little changes in few days!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: It helps my with back support and it has help me much with my posture. It was uncomfortable for the first two days because my body wasn’t use to it. It got better and had helped me slimmed down. I workout and it had help tighten my core. I would buy again. I keep it on for about 8 hours a day. It is a great price and great material.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: I Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s good, it fits absolutely perfect 😊 I ordered a large, my waist is 33inches and I’m 5’5 and it’s been a week already. My advice to you guys is that it only helps if you don’t have much belly fat or if your constantly working out to achieve your flat stomach so it’s best to order it if your already close to achieving a flat stomach. Very good product, I wear it everyday, so that I can see results in the nearer future 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple other waist bands that I used and this specific band is by far the best. It does give you some figure or shape because of it's middle band that makes the center tighter. The material use is fantastic. It absorbs the sweat but doesn't give you the wet and greasy feeling after use. It's easy to clean as well, i just toss it in the washer on delicate settings and air dry it. It also gives me good back support. It's perfect! Would definitely highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: smooocheeze

customer_reviews.title: Flattens!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I ordered because I need a little help after having twin boys and a daughter within 354 days of each other, and baby, this is the truth. It not only helps with my posture, but produces sweat and flattens my tummy. I'm eager to start working out with it, but only when it is SAFE to return to the gym. Until then, I'll use it working working around the house and chasing my offspring!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Fit and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always hesitant to purchase something without trying it on but this was great! I'm bra size DD 38 and pant size 16. Not sure of my waist but it's the smallest section of me. The zipper section fit my chest perfectly and even during work outs and sauna stretches it still stays in place. Easy to clean too! Considering buying a second since I'm going to the gym more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: The material is tearing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in January 2020 but starting using it at the end of February 2020. It is only first week of April, and material is tearing already! I am very disappointed by product! does it have guarantee?
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: You can loose 3-4cm in a week!!
customer_reviews.text: This shaping waistband is ideal for wearing in the gym, all day at home or work, you can always wear it. Corrects posture since sometimes we forget how the proper way to sit down or simply walk with our shoulders bent, it also helps to compress the abdomen and mold your waist thanks to the side band that makes us sweat at the front of the abdomen. My problem has always been fat accumulated in the upper and lower abdomen and this girdle has helped me lose measurements in a week of using it, helping me with good nutrition and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hernández

customer_reviews.title: I searched far and wide. Here it is!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching far and wide for the perfect waist trainer and this is it! It was exactly what I expected in size. The material is strong. It has 2 velcro tighteners. I have worn it a few times to the gym while I work out and it definatley supports my back and forces me to keep my stomach myscles engaged. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: And sturdy material. Im a small sinched up just fine
customer_reviews.text: This corset fir as desired. And sturdy material . Im a small cinched up just fine. The "leather" plastic on it looks very cheap and the cordage too. I will be adding my own leather and cordage to it. All around I like it enough not to return it. I guess I get what I pay for . BUT THE COLOR is way darker than advertised! I was really wanting it to be a light, It's dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this one, it is more comfortable than I expected, I use it for my work out and is really good I thought that it was short but it's perfect to do abs exercises. I recommend it if you want support in your back and you use heavy weight. Mine is a little loose, but I want it like that because I like to feel free when I'm working out, if you want too tight check the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Well made but skin may show in the back.
customer_reviews.text: The panel in the back that is supposed to cover your skin was too small, so my skin showed. I actually took the stripped panel off and extended it with black material. I would have returned it for a larger size but everything else fit great and I was on a time crunch. Overall i am very happy with the quality and i would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eastman

customer_reviews.title: This makes the shape !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this product , is perfect for the work out time or to use during the day! Fits so good and you really feel the tension on your hips and abdomen, also works as a posture corrector. The material is softer and I live it. It arrived on time and in great conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria

customer_reviews.title: qualitys ok but nothing to help you lose weight
customer_reviews.text: quality of the band is good but this band will not help you lose weight. FYI I tried it I want to send back it has done nothing. The bottom line is stuff like this is a fad. It is no different that the bands that you wear to help your back when you life, like you see employees wearing at a home improvement store or warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: andi

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for postpartum
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me a few weeks after giving birth. I lost so much weight and inches by using this. I had to get a smaller waist trainer sooner than expected. It isn’t the most complicated though and there’s this plastic thing that supports it will poke the side of you so I ended up taking it out. It’ll show if you wear a fitted tshirt so wear loose clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Davis

customer_reviews.title: It Is Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is a whole lot more comfortable than I thought it would be. If they have thigh slimmers I will be buying those next. For any one whole is thinking about slimming your waistline down without being uncomfortable and still be able to breath, try theirs you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this corset.
customer_reviews.text: Super important for sizing. I normally wear a small or extra small in clothing, and I ordered a large in this based on other reviews. It fits perfectly. I'm a 34B with a 27" waist. It is more of a chocolate brown and black stripe and it is a shiny satin material. I got the impression it was more of a taupe and dark brown without the shine from the photos, but I'm still really pleased. It looks great on and is great quality, especially considering the price. I would absolutely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynnTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Ver comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was pleasantly surprised that it was such nice quality. This is my first waist trainer and I absolutely love it. Very comfortable and stays put no slipping or even rolling up. The product has many Velcro straps for more security. It supports your back and compressed your tummy. It also makes you sweat the abs are while training would definitely recommended if you do weight lifting and need to protect your back or if you do cardio and are trying to burn belly fat.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Montero

customer_reviews.title: Tummy hangs out of the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that this waist trainer doesn't do what it says it does. I have had children so I have a bit of a mommy pooch and when I wear this waist trainer my belly hangs out of the bottom and that was one of the things that this waist trainer said it helps with. Not to mention it's relatively uncomfortable to wear. I ended up buying another one elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Athletic Style Waist Trainer
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer has a bit more of an athletic fit than a traditional hook corset. It is sturdy, steel-boned, the velcro holds well, and everything is still in great shape (no pun intended) after months of wear. And speaking of shape, the shape the belt gives me is subtle yet nice. This is good to wear while working out, during work, or anytime during the day, so long as it's only worn for a few hours at a time. I would recommend this product. 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. I ordered a l and my waist is small. It doesn't stretch. The straps stretch a little to hold in place. I love it. I wear under my clothes at work.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer for sure. I've had 2 babies and am fluctuating around 185 lbs. This waist trainer has given me so much confidence after wearing it every weekday for 3-4 weeks now
customer_reviews.author: chelsey

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Good material for sweating. 9” in height to cover from pubic area to bottom of bra. Five flexible yet hold you in place spines/ wires perfectly placed to give that hourglass look. I wear a size 10, 155# with a waist size of 35”. Bought a size large and it fits comfortably with ability to size down because of the waist straps. Able to pull waist straps from both sides which helps you to pull into your desired shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lady just

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a small if you are thin like me
customer_reviews.text: The material and Velcro make this Waist Trainer Belt worth it. Originally I ordered a Medium which fit my size 145 body way too large. I bought the size thinking it would fit my pudge . Mind you i'm a thin woman , with a stomach and no matter how much I adjusted it, the Waist Trainer was too loose. I recommend a small if you are thin like me. In womens size the "Small' ranges anywhere from 120 to probably 150 I can't be sure. definitely Great quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Prettypearls

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, Upper back pain
customer_reviews.text: This came in the package dirty which makes me think it was returned from another person in the past. I washed it & it was fine, which is good to know you can throw it in the washer/ dryer without a problem. I really want to like this & it does relieve lumbar pain so i’m not sure if it’s my awful posture or what, but instead it really hurts my upper back.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella M

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday during my workout and really helpful, is strong and it always keeps its place, you can wear it under or over your clothes as you wish, is a little uncomfortable during some workouts exercises but its not like you can't do the exercise, I really like this product and I would recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job for me!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that since it does not completely cover the entire torso it would be a disadvantage but to my surprise, it still helped my stomach go down. I run and exercise with it on. I don't take it off until I go to bed. It does work. It also seems to straighten my back. Didn't expect that.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer63

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is too weird
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is so weird, in the picture is covers the model’s whole front and with me it doesn’t. The torso length is so short for being an XL. If you are a short person I’d say this will work or you but if you are on the heavier or taller side like me I don’t think this is what you’re looking for. I don’t think I will be keeping this because it seems like all of them will have a torso that’s too short.
customer_reviews.author: Alina R.

customer_reviews.title: Stronger bone and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Product feels good. Ordered a XL but was at the furthest the Velcro could go. I am returning it for a large. Bones feel strong. I’ve tried other waist trainers and with the deep curve from my back to butt they bend in half and stab me. This one makes me stand straight. Haven’t worked out in it yet. I’ll update once I have.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I love this sooo much!
customer_reviews.text: Feels so nice. I get back issues now and then and have a hernia in my stomach so I have to be more careful. When my back is out of wack I put this on for a couple hours and it helps so much. I feel the magnets straighten my back out. Was a weird feeling at first but tells me its working. A must have. And it don't seem to bother my hernia.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeUsername

customer_reviews.title: Shaperex is the best
customer_reviews.text: I’m a busy mother who works at a hospital trying to shop to find the perfect waist trainer/ shaper has been hard until I came across this prodruct I love love love it I have purchased three two for me and one for my sister I purchased an xl instantly was shedding weight needed a smaller size my sister was so impressed with the weight loss she wanted one too it’s a must buy and absolutely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Chassity

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a little more converge. But still decent.
customer_reviews.text: Started off great and did get results. But after a few weeks, the bones inside started to rip out from the bottom. (See photo) Also wish it was about an inch or two longer as I feel like I’m coming out a little bit at the top. I started off with a large and If I were to re-order, I would get a medium this time because I have noticed results.
customer_reviews.author: Chanale Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my back and posture
customer_reviews.text: the product does run somewhat small - but I did buy it for part of my physical therapy I have degenerated discs in my lower back - for that it is extremely useful and I would recommend it to other who need help strengthening their backs - good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Hosler

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaper!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best shapers I’ve tried! Once it’s on, you can adjust it two more times with two more bands for a perfect fit. I followed the advice from another reviewer who suggested a large size if you would normally get a medium-that was the best advice because I have more freedom to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna W

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waist trainer to help slim my waist during workouts. I started wearing it to the gym and although it was very uncomfortable at first, I have eased my way into the habit of wearing it and see drastic results within one month of normally wearing it. I tend to wear it all day on the days I go to the gym. It really is useful and good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today and immediately put it on. I initially bought it for working out which I'll probably come back and do an update. I've never had a waist trainer and this one is so comfortable for a first time buy. I like how it supports my back because I do struggle with back issues (at my young age it's sad lol). I like the adjustable waistbands on the side as well.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C.

customer_reviews.title: Too big😢
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive it but it was too big so I had to give it away. My waist is a 32 so I got the large, I should have gotten the medium or even the small but the person I gave it to is happy. It seems very sturdy and it is comfortable to wear but I do not recommend to women with a significant amount of lower belly fat because your lower belly fat will just hand and upper belly fat and extra skin will stick out too. If I had gotten a medium I would rate 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad it fit
customer_reviews.text: Unlike previous waist trainers I’ve tried, this was my size. Cute color, but, soooo uncomfortable 😣. It does not cover my full torso, the boning pierces my skin, it shows under clothes, and after 3 uses, I haven’t seen any results.
customer_reviews.author: elia21

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: I will say I was a little skeptical at first but after reading other reviews I decided to take a chance. I bought a bigger size not because of my breast but my stomach. I had a breast reduction a year ago so chest size wasn’t what I needed to go by. However it was a perfect fit and it has a pocket inside for your phone. After using it for a week I’ve lost a good amount of weight and I noticed that my stomach got smaller each time I used it. I would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia warfield

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this waist trainer I read all the reviews in which everyone stated how comfortable it was...... unfortunately that is inaccurate. This waist trainer is very uncomfortable and feels more like a brace then a waist trainer. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 year ago. I have been using it and have lost 10+lbs. Need to buy a size smaller now. I think it works better when its tighter. You sweat more! Has a strong chemical odor when you first get it. But it washes out. And it washes well too! I was 5’5 195lbs a year ago and bought a 2XG.. Now I weigh 183lbs and need a XLG. I originally bought a 3X based on the size chart. It was too big! I’m more of an apple shape so I carry most of my weight in the chest and stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tait

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its just me but this product did nothing for me and was too small.. I did try my best to make it work and give an honest review .. read other reviews before making my purchase. I'm sure someone could use it for a girdle but it did not work well with my body shape
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Mata

customer_reviews.title: Well recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase, it has helped me a lot with my back pain, it helps me to have my back straight, improve my posture at the same time to model my waist, it is very effective to exercise, it is comfortable and I use it every day at home and when I go for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Iliana Escobar

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this corset but based on reviews I decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this corset but based on reviews I decided to go larger than normal. I ordered the 5xl which was way too big...it fit like a vest and not a corset...with Amazon prime I was able to easily exchange for the 4xl which turned out ok but it didn't shape my figure I expected from a corset...so, returned again for the 3xl. 3rd time is the charm because it turned out to fit like a dream and gave me that hourglass shape I wanted. Great vendor, great prompt professional service. The quality of the corset is as pictured -- superb.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belt
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to belt for both working out, or just wearing as a waist trainer. It is adjustable with strong velcro closures. It is by far the most comfortable belt I've tried. The only down side is that the velcro can rub uncomfortably against skin, so its necessary to wear a tank top under it. I've had it for quite a while and it is still like new, so it is made very well! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShopToo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my back straight
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt. It cinches my waist and gives me support when I do strength training. It also helps correct my posture. I wash it by hand and hang it up to dry. It's sturdy and doesn't flop over when it's on. You can adjust how tight you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Shalom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, comfortable, can adjust to make tighter or looser. Not for working out though, the back of it digs in. It could be a bit longer vertically but still great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L. Marra

customer_reviews.title: Great waist trainer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the belt on Wed and it arrived on Thursday I am really surprised at how great the quality is and it really cinches the waist I cant wait to add it to my workout I'm 5'10 230lbs and I ordered a sz large and the fit is great I'll update again in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: MzReed

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an XL. It was too big. I wear a size 18/20 women's depending on the brand. I'm not sure if a L would fit or be too tight. I did not order a L because even though I feel the product would provide adequate back support, the front straps did not provide full coverage for my mid-section area. This product seems better suited for stomachs that are not big as the front straps do not provide full coverage for bigger stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: O. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I love it. My waist is shrinking!
customer_reviews.text: I like this waist trainer. Irs helping to shrink my waist. I’m not Exercising at all. Just eating sensibly. I’m a thick, but petite girl. I should’ve gotten a size smaller for optimal tightness. I totally recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product does get some time getting used to, but they provide a plan for you and has greatly improved my posture! I used to slouch every time I sat down. but I'm happy to say that this helped prevent that from happening. When I wear this, I immediately go into productive mode and love to use this for that purpose (and to improve my posture of course!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product! It provides ample support while working out. The Velcro has a good grip and doesn’t bust open unannounced. It’s also very easy to put on and take off. I wouldn’t wear this under a dress or anything like that though because its too bulky for that. My only wish is that they make this is extra small because after two weeks of wearing this consistently, the small is now big for me. That’s how great this product is!
customer_reviews.author: Fitmama_gianna

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well I ordered a medium , I am 5’41/2 ft tall and 165lbs and it’s really tight, in hindsight I should have ordered a large but my mid section doesn’t stick out so much so I was scared a large would be too big. Yet instill it works really well I have worked out in it a few times and it did make me sweat really good in my mid section. As far as comfort it’s not that comfortable ( but that could be due to me not getting a large) either way it’s an overall good product, I would recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bazemore

customer_reviews.title: I've used many waist trainer/shapers and none suck in the way this one does
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing...I've used many waist trainer/shapers and none suck in the way this one does. This is comfortable and is almost discreet underneath clothing. I work behind a computer all day so this definitely helps with my posture. Only thing I wish is that it covered more of the stomach area. Either way...still love it. Have been wearing it for over 3 weeks and I definitely see and feel a difference. NOTE: This is along with exercise and eating decent. Not perfect but decent :)
customer_reviews.author: derrick e. shaw sr

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Holds well and does NOT roll or ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Great fit. Holds well and does NOT roll or slide. I’ve worn it for 3 days, 8 hours each day. Great for posture and really holds it in. I wear it with jeans and with a loose fitting shirt you don’t notice it. I’m a size 12 jeans and I got a large. Will probably order a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Shanaya

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 foot 2 inches tall and wear a 36 C and weigh 182 pounds. I bought a large and it fits just right. I have worn this all day and I am waiting to see how this will work along with exercise. I will be back in a few weeks for an update. The vest is EXCELLENT though....
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate to Buy!!  Very Good trainer!!
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 stars! It's well made with durable fabric that will last a long time. It's not definitely not flimsy. I like the Velcro closure. Previously, I bought a more expensive waist trainer with hooks. I hated the hooks and found it very difficult to close. So I wasted more than $45! I love this one! The only reason I gave it a 4 instead 5, is that I wish that it was a little longer and extended a wee bit more onto the belly. Other than that, it's a great trainer and well worth the money! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. BenAvram

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this corset for the Renaissance Festival my boyfriend and I went to and it was a perfect fit. I was really worried about the shoulder straps because I’m pretty small but having the straps tightened all the way made it fit just right. It’s steel boned so it held that perfect shape really well. It’s good quality and comfortable when tightened just right (but not too much of course). I ordered the small. Im 5’, about 106lbs, and usually an XS-S in tops.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece/runs small
customer_reviews.text: The corset is perfect for a steam punk costume, very well made. I am 34 bust/30 waist and the small even with the laces pulled as far out to make extend in back, it was too small. Still needed another 4" before I could pull the front together. Luckily this was for my 13 yr. old which was still a snug fit. So a small should def. go with a med. Other than sizing the product itself was gorgeous, looked more costly than it was. We loved the way it looked!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

product_meta.title: SHAPERX Women Waist Trainer Belt Waist Trimmer Slimming Belly Band Body Shaper Sports Girdles Workout Belt
feature_bullets: ►Double Adjustment Velcro Closure - Strong compression around your belly for tummy control, Super flexible to adjust the tightness. Never worry about velcro falling off or waist band rolling during workout and everyday wear.

►Durable Elastic Neoprene Fabrics - this waist trainer trimmer belt is made of stretchy neoprene fabric, designed with ventilation holes to maxmize compression while being breathable for maximum comfort.

►Instant Waist Training & Hourglass Effect - Instantly flattening and smoothing your tummy and slimming your waistline. Comfortable for wearing it daily. Combined with workout and waist training, this waist trimmer belt can help lose belly fat and sculpt +4 inches off your waistline in the longer term.

►Lumber Support & Back Pain Relief - 4 Reinforced flex-boning provides enhancced support to your sides and back, and help reduce lower back pain. Our waist trainer trimmer belt acts like a compression binder around the waist to offer lumbar support, keep your muscles warm, and stabilize spine.

►Waist Slimming & Post Pregnancy Recovery - Smooth your belly and help tummy control and ideal for post pregnancy recovery, help your body get back to its original shape. With the flexible adjustment, you can comfortably wear it for work, daily outfit, workout, fitness or yoga.
